items.name: Chole Masala
items.description: A popular North Indian dish made with chickpeas cooked in a flavorful blend of spices, tomatoes, and onions, creating a rich and aromatic curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Punjabi Lamb Curry
items.description: A hearty and flavorful dish from the North Indian cuisine, featuring tender pieces of lamb cooked in a robust blend of spices, tomatoes, and onions. This curry is known for its rich and aromatic gravy, making it a popular choice
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Aloo Tikki
items.description: Boiled potatoes mashed and mixed with different spices, fresh coriander and shaped into a patty and shallow fried. Served with tomato ketchup. (4 tikki)

items.name: Aloo Matar & Gajar ki Sabzi
items.description: A popular North Indian dish that features a combination of potatoes (aloo), peas (matar), and carrots (gajar) cooked with aromatic spices. Served with 2 chapatis

items.name: Niramish Alur Dum
items.description: A Bengali delicacy featuring baby potatoes cooked in a creamy yogurt-based gravy, infused with aromatic spices, creating a delectable and comforting dish
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Murgir Jhol
items.description: A wholesome chicken curry from the state of Kolkata. Chicken cooked with flavourful spices, onion, potatoes, ginger, garlic and yogurt
items.extra: make it a meal with rice/ paratha + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Kathi Roll
items.description: Flaky egg paratha, cucumber, pickled onions and lime juice wrapped into a pefect roll. Served with green spicy chutney.

items.name: Kichuri
items.description: A flavorful dish made with rice, lentils, mixed vegetables, and aromatic spices.

items.name: Manga Pulisherry
items.description: A traditional Kerala dish made with ripe mangoes cooked in a tangy yogurt and coconut base, imparting a delightful sweet and sour flavor.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Malabar Spicy Beef Roast
items.description: A South Indian dish with roots in the Malabar region, known for its vibrant and aromatic flavors. This curry features tender beef cooked in a rich and spicy coconut-based gravy, infused with a blend of traditional spices. It's a staple in Malabar cuisine .
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Dal Vada
items.description: A deep-fried snack made from ground lentils mixed with spices, onions, and herbs like curry leaves. The mixture is shaped into rounds and deep-fried until crispy and golden brown. (4 pieces)

items.name: Sambar Rice
items.description: A comfort meal from the south of India. Lentils and veggies cooked together with tamarind, and freshly made sambar masala tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Served with rice + papad

items.name: Paneer Tikka Aloo Dum Biryani
items.description: A flavorful Indian dish that combines marinated paneer tikka (grilled cottage cheese) and baby potatoes with aromatic biryani rice. The dish is layered and slow-cooked to perfection, allowing the spices and flavors to infuse into the rice, creating a rich and delicious one-pot meal. Served with raita + achar + papad.

items.name: Chicken Tikka Biryani
items.description: Spicy chicken grilled over coal and cooked in a flavourful gravy of onion and tomato and other spices together with aromatic basmati rice and fried onions. Served with yogurt dip + achar + papad

items.name: Onion Pakoda
items.description: A popular Indian snack made by batter-coating thinly sliced onions with a spiced gram flour (besan) mixture and deep-frying until crispy. (8 pieces)

items.name: Palak Dal & Chawal
items.description: A nutritious Indian dish made by combining yellow lentils (dal) with fresh spinach (palak) and seasoned with aromatic spices.

items.name: Veg Triple Schezwan Fried Rice
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish that offers a delightful explosion of flavours. This dish features a combination of mixed vegetables stir-fried with cooked rice and tossed in a spicy Schezwan sauce. The sauce, known for its robust and fiery taste, adds a tangy and aromatic element to the dish.
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Triple Schezwan Fried Rice
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish that offers a delightful explosion of flavours. This dish features a combination of mixed vegetables stir-fried with cooked rice, chicken and tossed in a spicy Schezwan sauce. The sauce, known for its robust and fiery taste, adds a tangy and aromatic element to the dish.
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of chicken manchurian gravy by the side.

items.name: Chinese Bhel
items.description: An Indo-Chinese fusion street food that combines elements of Indian and Chinese cuisine. It consists of crisp fried noodles mixed chopped vegetables tossed in a flavorful dressing made with soy sauce, chili sauce, and other seasonings.

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar + papad.

items.name: Veg Dhansak
items.description: A wholesome Parsi dish made of mix vegetables and lentils cooked together with fresh spices and topped with fresh coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad

items.name: Chicken Salli Curry
items.description: A popular Parsi chicken dish that consists of tender pieces of chicken cooked in a flavorful and aromatic curry, often accompanied by "sali" or crispy potato straw fries. The chicken curry is typically rich and well-spiced, creating a delicious contrast with the crunchy texture of the sali.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Kheema Pattice
items.description: A popular Parsi dish featuring spiced minced meat (kheema) encased in mashed potatoes, shaped into patties, and shallow-fried until golden brown, creating a delicious blend of savory flavors and textures. (4 pieces)

items.name: Akoori
items.description: A Parsi-style spiced scrambled eggs dish made with onions, tomatoes, green chilies, and aromatic spices. Served with 2 pav

items.name: Navratna Korma
items.description: A rich dish made with assorted mix of veggies and nuts in a creamy gravy with spices. A flavourful comfort for your soul.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Muglai Chicken Curry
items.description: A rich and flavorful curry featuring tender chicken cooked in a creamy and aromatic sauce. The sauce is made with a luxurious blend of ingredients such as cream, yogurt, nuts, and aromatic spices, creating a dish known for its indulgent taste and royal Mughlai influence.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chapli Kebab
items.description: A popular dish featuring ground chicken mixed with spices, herbs and gram flour, shaped into round patties and pan-fried until crispy. (4 kebab)

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices and topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with steamy rice and papad.

items.name: Golyachi Aamti
items.description: Spiced besan combined with ginger garlic paste, onions and more, made into balls, dunked in tamarind based spicy gravy
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Kolapuri Kala Lamb Sukka
items.description: A dish from Kolhapur cuisine known for its bold and spicy flavors. This dish often involves marinating lamb with a blend of robust spices, including black cardamom, black pepper, and a variety of other aromatic ingredients.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Vada Pav
items.description: A famous veggie burger from the streets of Mumbai. The patty is made of boiled potatoes mixed with spices, coated in chickpea flour and fried to perfection. This is stuffed in a bun smeared with spicy green chutney and dry garlic chutney. (2 vada pav)

items.name: Masala Bhat
items.description: Rice cooked with onion, tomato, potato and other vegetables with spices and garnished with coriander

items.name: Kathal Biryani
items.description: Jackfruit cooked with a special spice blend and layered with partially cooked basmati rice, allowing the flavors to meld together with the rice. Served with a side of yogurt raita and papad.

items.name: Chicken Berry Pulao
items.description: A popular Parsi dish that is a delicious blend of sweet and savory flavors. The dish is made with fragrant basmati rice, tender chicken, and a variety of aromatic spices. The pulao is then topped with a mix of sweet and tangy berries, caramelized onions, and nuts, giving it a beautiful and unique taste. Served with raita + achar + papad.

items.name: Chole Tikki Chat
items.description: A popular Indian street food that combines spicy and tangy chickpeas (chole) with crisp potato patties (tikki), topped with yogurt, chutneys, and various garnishes. (2 tikki)

items.name: Chicken Tehari
items.description: One pot chicken rice cooked with caramalised onion, tomato, ginger-garlic paste and fresh garam masala

items.name: Veg Chowmein
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made with assorted veggies cooked together with rice and noodles with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Chicken Chowmein
items.description: Indo-Chinese stir fry made with assorted veggies and chicken and cooked together with rice and noodles in flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Veg Schezwan Frankie
items.description: Shallow fried spiced mashed potato wrapped in whole wheat flatbread with onions and frankie masala. Served with green chutney.

items.name: Tomato Rice
items.description: Rice cooked with onions & tomato, tempered with mustard seeds, peanuts and fresh curry leaves. Served with papad.
